snippet.title: Paper Animal Adventure - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Explore the colorful, charming world of Paper Animal Adventure and get a closer look at gameplay in this latest trailer for the upcoming roguelike game. Paper Animal Adventure will be coming to Early Access in Early/Mid 2025. Paper Animal Adventure is a cute roguelike game where you can explore a colorful world, fight scary enemies and relax with your friends at the campfire! It features a unique board game-inspired yet real time battle & exploration system mixed with a 2D-meets-3D artstyle. Will you be the one to seal the timelines and find the missing king?
